tachyon.master.keyvalue

Class KeyValueMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.MasterBase
      • tachyon.master.keyvalue.KeyValueMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable, Master

    @ThreadSafe
public final class KeyValueMaster
extends MasterBase
    The key-value master stores key-value store information in Tachyon, including the partitions of each key-value store.

      • processJournalEntry

        public void processJournalEntry(Journal.JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

        public void streamToJournalCheckpoint(JournalOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • start

        public void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Master
        Overrides:
        start in class MasterBase
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • completePartition

        public void completePartition(TachyonURI path,
                              PartitionInfo info)
                       throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                              AccessControlException
        Marks a partition complete and adds it to an incomplete key-value store.
        Parameters:
        path - URI of the key-value store
        info - information of this completed parition
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the key-value store URI does not exists
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails

      • deleteStore

        public void deleteStore(TachyonURI uri)
                 throws IOException,
                        InvalidPathException,
                        FileDoesNotExistException,
                        TachyonException
        Deletes a completed key-value store.
        Parameters:
        uri - TachyonURI to the store
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        InvalidPathException - if the uri exists but is not a key-value store
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the uri does not exist
        TachyonException - if other Tachyon error occurs

      • mergeStore

        public void mergeStore(TachyonURI fromUri,
                       TachyonURI toUri)
                throws IOException,
                       FileDoesNotExistException,
                       InvalidPathException,
                       TachyonException
        Merges one completed key-value store to another completed key-value store.
        Parameters:
        fromUri - the TachyonURI to the store to be merged
        toUri - the TachyonURI to the store to be merged to
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        InvalidPathException - if the uri exists but is not a key-value store
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the uri does not exist
        TachyonException - if other Tachyon error occurs
